alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Brunswick County through 345 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, or 9 miles northeast of Holden Beach, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph, dangerous cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Holden Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Yaupon Beach, Ocean Crest Pier, St. James, Southport, Civie Town, Supply, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Long Beach, Varnamtown, Dosher Memorial Hospital and Brunswick Novant Medical Center. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 20 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
